column1: god bless you melanie for being proud of your faith.  amen sister
let's go melonie! i ve been waiting for you to talk about this!!
great video  loved it! and i hope and pray everything works out mel god bless you and anyone who reads this.  much love to all!
i love when you bring the bible into it  people need to hear it. have a great day please  always wishing the best for you.
thanks for another great video  melanie  and god bless  everyone
thanks for everything you do melonie! stay strong!
